COLOR_PALETTE.TITLE: Color Palette
COLOR_PALETTE.QUOTE: Just as one can compose colors, or forms, so one can compose motions.

CATEGORIES.TITLE: Categories
CATEGORIES.QUOTE: Not everyone needs to be slammed into a category and locked there.
CATEGORIES.EMPTY: Keine Kategorien vorhanden bzw. konnten diese nicht geladen werden.

LANGUAGE.TITLE: Language
LANGUAGE.QUOTE: Use what language you will, you can never say anything but what you are.
